settings.copy_ritht_text: Copyright © Zazoo Designs 2022 | Website by Helena Traill Design

settings.slider_content: Handmade in Jaipur... Entirely handmade and invariably unique.

settings.section_title_paragraph: Find your favourite piece of Zazoo.

settings.about_content:
I have been a caterer most of my life and was looking for the perfect tray,
so I designed my own, and here they are ....

They are exceptional value, cool colours, the best goddam trays in town.

Contact katherine@zazoodesign.com

settings.support_content: Solid, sturdy, and uncannily pretty designs and colours. I have put a lot of work into choosing colours and decorative patterns. I hope you approve!
We’re a humble lot here… with simple goals. We just want to create beautiful trays, that make you happy, and don’t bankrupt you in the process.
In the freakishly unlikely event that you should want to return your order… you will be delighted to hear that you can do so for free. Not bad, eh?

settings.about_title: Katherine has been designing beautiful things for years.
settings.about_content: Her latest thing is trays. Decorative, beautiful,  colourful, practical.
These are fantastic trays - have bought a few for presents and the colours are great - couldn’t recommend more.
